name: Guy Runner
description:
Guy Runner Adventure Game is the best-updated version with 3D perspective, better game physics, superb graphics, and with even more challenges to fulfill your heroic desire.

Your task is to help main character to run through the mysterious jungle, jump over obstacles, and super evil monsters to reach the final destination. This game is a free game and you can play it offline. You will like this Super free game.

Conquer the challenges, and have fun with Free Game!
